name: XenCenter Saved Search File
summary: Learn about .XENSEARCH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: XenCenter is included with XenServer.

description: File created by XenCenter, the program used for managing Citrix XenServer, a virtual machine management application; saves search criteria for locating virtual machines; allows the search to be performed again in the software.
